# 📚 BRDC Document Template
**Created by:** 📚 Lexicon (Bookkeeping Guru)  
**Date:** January 30, 2025  
**Purpose:** Standard template for all project documents with BRDC tagging and metadata

---

## 🏷️ **BRDC Header Template**

```yaml
---
brdc:
  id: AASF-DOC-XXX
  title: "Document Title"
  owner: "Persona Name"
  status: "canonical|draft|archived|deprecated|review|approved"
  version: "X.Y.Z"
  last_updated: "YYYY-MM-DD"
  self: "relative/path/to/file.md"
  tags: ["brdc", "documentation", "specific-tags"]
  related:
    - "path/to/related/doc1.md"
    - "path/to/related/doc2.md"
  dependencies:
    - "path/to/dependency1.md"
    - "path/to/dependency2.md"
  consciousness_level: "high|medium|low"
  healing_impact: "description of community healing impact"
  sacred_principles: ["principle1", "principle2", "principle3"]
---
